meanings.definition: A type of leaf with a single vein.
meanings.sent1: The microphylls on the plant were tiny and had only one vein.
meanings.sent2: The forest floor was covered with microphylls, each leaf displaying a single vein.
meanings.sent3: The microphylls whispered secrets to each other as the wind rustled through them.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like microphylls, simple and straightforward, with only one main idea.
meanings.sent5: The delicate microphylls danced in the sunlight, showcasing their single vein.
